__e: Normally a matter of small importance, but in this case it's our liege, Lord Henry, the eighth of that name.
Heinrich, King of the Germans, has come to this place to confer with you according to the law of the realm.
Um, Henry II, Richard I and bad King John.
Thus says my king, "Say thou to Harry of England, "though we seemed dead, we did but sleep.
Take me by the hand... and say, "Harry of England, I am thine."
Thus says my king... say thou to Harry of England... though we seemed dead, we did but sleep.
